languages.text: "Я прослежу, чтобы он был возвращен на корабль. Прошу прощения, Ваша Светлость, но поручение Лорд-инквизитора не терпело промедления. Я вынужден был воспользоваться вашими ресурсами".

traits.locale_text: "Я прослежу, чтобы он был возвращен на корабль. Прошу прощения, Ваша милость, но поручение Лорда-инквизитора не терпело промедления. Я вынужден был воспользоваться вашими ресурсами".

languages.text: "I will see to it that it is returned to your ship. My apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but the Lord Inquisitor's task was urgent. I was forced to avail myself of your resources."
languages.original_text: "Я прослежу, чтобы он был возвращен на корабль. Прошу прощения, Ваша Светлость, но поручение Лорд-инквизитора не терпело промедления. Я вынужден был воспользоваться вашими ресурсами".

traits.locale_text: "I will see to it that it is returned to your ship. Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but the Lord Inquisitor's task was urgent. I was forced to avail myself of your resources."
"I will see to it that it is returned to your ship. Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but the Lord Inquisitor's task was urgent. I was forced to avail myself of your resources."
"I will see to it that it is returned to your ship. My apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but the Lord Inquisitor's task was urgent. I was forced to avail myself of your resources."
"I will see to it that it is returned to your ship. My apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but the Lord Inquisitor's task was urgent. I was forced to avail myself of your resources."
"I will see to it that it is returned to your ship. My apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but the Lord Inquisitor's task was urgent. I was forced to avail myself of your resources."

languages.text: 「船には戻るつもりだ。すまない、陛下。だが、ロード・インクィジターからの任務は緊急案件だった。あなたのリソースを使わせてもらうしかなかったのだ」
languages.original_text: "I will see to it that it is returned to your ship. My apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but the Lord Inquisitor's task was urgent. I was forced to avail myself of your resources."

traits.locale_text: 「船には戻るつもりだ。すまない、陛下。だが、ロード・インクィジターからの任務は緊急案件だった。あなたのリソースを使わせてもらうしかなかったのだ」

languages.original_text: "I will see to it that it is returned to your ship. My apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but the Lord Inquisitor's task was urgent. I was forced to avail myself of your resources."

languages.text: “我保证原物奉还舰上。很抱歉，大人，大审判官的任务实在太过紧急，我不得不征用你的资源。”
languages.original_text: "I will see to it that it is returned to your ship. My apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but the Lord Inquisitor's task was urgent. I was forced to avail myself of your resources."

traits.locale_text: “我保证原物奉还舰上。很抱歉，大人，审判长的任务实在太过紧急，我不得不征用你的资源。”

languages.text: «Me ocuparé de que se le devuelva. Lo siento, mi{mf|lord|lady}, pero la misión del Lord Inquisidor era urgente y me vi obligado a usar sus recursos».
languages.original_text: "I will see to it that it is returned to your ship. My apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but the Lord Inquisitor's task was urgent. I was forced to avail myself of your resources."

traits.locale_text: «Me ocuparé de que se le devuelva. Lo siento, mi{mf|lord|lady}, pero la misión del Lord Inquisidor era urgente y me vi obligado a usar sus recursos».

languages.text: « Je veillerai à ce qu'elle soit reconduite à votre vaisseau. Pardonnez-moi, Votre Seigneurie, mais la mission du seigneur inquisiteur était des plus urgentes. Je n'ai pas eu d'autre choix que de m'approprier vos ressources. »
languages.original_text: "I will see to it that it is returned to your ship. My apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but the Lord Inquisitor's task was urgent. I was forced to avail myself of your resources."

traits.locale_text: « Je veillerai à ce qu'elle soit reconduite à votre vaisseau. Pardonnez-moi, Votre Seigneurie, mais la mission du seigneur inquisiteur était des plus urgentes. Je n'ai pas eu d'autre choix que de m'approprier vos ressources. »

languages.text: "Ich werde dafür sorgen, dass es Eurem Schiff zurückgegeben wird. Verzeiht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, aber die Aufgabe des Großinquisitors war dringend. Ich war gezwungen, mich Eurer Ressourcen zu bedienen."
languages.original_text: "I will see to it that it is returned to your ship. My apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but the Lord Inquisitor's task was urgent. I was forced to avail myself of your resources."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde dafür sorgen, dass es Eurem Schiff zurückgegeben wird. Verzeiht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, aber die Aufgabe des Großinquisitors war dringend. Ich war gezwungen, mich Eurer Ressourcen zu bedienen."

languages.text: "Mekiği gemiye gönderteceğim. Özürlerimi sunarım {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri ama Lord Engizisyoncu'nun görevi son derece acildi. Kaynaklarından istifade etmek durumunda kaldım."
languages.original_text: "I will see to it that it is returned to your ship. My apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but the Lord Inquisitor's task was urgent. I was forced to avail myself of your resources."

traits.locale_text: "Gemine geri gönderilmesini sağlayacağım. Özürlerimi sunarım {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri ama Lord Engizisyoncu'nun görevi son derece acildi. Kaynaklarından istifade etmek durumunda kaldım."
